description: Example: Simple parameter passing from task to actions. Demonstrates basic parameter binding with task.params and actor context.

steps.description: Move to the location where the item is located

targetItem.description: Entity ID of the item to acquire and consume

itemLocation.description: Entity ID of the room/location containing the item

notes: This example demonstrates basic parameter passing using task.params
The first step uses a condition to check if movement is needed
Parameters are passed directly to action target bindings
No state accumulation is used - each step gets parameters from task.params
The actor context is accessed in conditions to check current position
